definition:
&%AirlineCodeMap denotes the &%SymbolicString
used by different aviation organizations to identify &%Airline
opposite_reasoning: AirlineCodeMap is a highly abstract concept - a relational mapping system that exists purely as information. PhysicalEntity provides the strongest available opposition as the category of concrete, tangible things. This abstract↔physical axis is fundamental in ontology and widely available. While UnmappedEntity would be more semantically precise (mapped↔unmapped), it doesn't exist in standard ontologies. PhysicalEntity is a reliable, high-availability opposite that creates meaningful separation in concept space for Fisher-LDA, distinguishing abstract symbolic systems from concrete objects.
